solution_line_template: 1 truck uses {tanks_per_truck} tanks of {capacity_per_tank} liters, so a truck can carry {tanks_per_truck} tanks per truck * {capacity_per_tank} liters = <<{tanks_per_truck}*{capacity_per_tank}={capacity_per_truck}>>{capacity_per_truck} liters per truck.
The total amount of water the {num_trucks} trucks carry is {num_trucks} trucks * {capacity_per_truck} liters per truck= <<{num_trucks}*{capacity_per_truck}={total_capacity}>>{total_capacity} liters.
